contest-event.event-date: April 30, 1977 D Midlands Area (Third Section) Midlands Area (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-third-section National Championship of Great Britain (Third Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Third Rococo Variations on a Theme of Tchaikovsky [Street] Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK 15 bands competed.
